title: Google previews how password-killing ‘passkeys’ will work on Android, Chrome
content:
Following our report last month, Google today announced its support for “passwordless FIDO Sign-in standards” and previewed what the end-user experience of passkeys on Android and Chrome will look like. 

more…

The post Google previews how password-killing ‘passkeys’ will work on Android, Chrome appeared first on 9to5Google.
